name: Traumafly #2
description:
An experiment with using Video Pro X (frequently on sale through Humble Bundle fyi) to map video on the inside of a sphere and I believe I got the smearing textures through sliding the perspective way back and using a fish eye lens.

Getting close to 2001 A Space Odyssey here, that or a Meshuggah album cover.

A continuation of the Inspirit + WAAAVES + OBS chain prior to editing.
